title: Recent mods/fangames/levels
content: Has there been anymore recent mods/fangames or levels in the past 2 years? Havent seen much recently, I just found theses forums and I have played mods/levels/fangames by you guys and a lot of them are great

title: Re: Recent mods/fangames/levels
content:
Welcome, comrade. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

There's been some good things in the past couple of years. I haven't exactly been keeping track of when specific things were released. Check out the Release Forum, because there's some good things there. Also, you can go see Garg's Mod Maze, which seems to be pretty up to date on Keen mods. There's been one Keen 4 mod released (Keys of Krodacia) which is really awesome, so you should go look into that.[img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]

title: Re: Recent mods/fangames/levels
content:
Keys of Krodacia is really awesome! A lesson in Ascillan:

In the Dawn of a new age
"Hu beikacho-yon xa beidhakyo-yut."

In an eternal quest for world peace.
"Hu ebe'et sayboo'lin-yut yyk choo'i-yon."

Will you be my friend?
"Chi choo'zilli xa ut kle?"
